Download MSOA centroids for England and Wales

Source: R/msoa_centroids.R
get_centroids_ew.Rd

Downloads and processes data on where people live in England and Wales. See geoportal.statistics.gov.uk.

get_centroids_ew()

Examples

pwc = get_centroids_ew()
#> Rows: 7201 Columns: 6
#> ── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> Delimiter: ","
#> chr (2): MSOA11CD, MSOA11NM
#> dbl (4): BNGEAST, BNGNORTH, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE
#> 
#> ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
#> ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
plot(pwc[sample(nrow(pwc), 1000), ])
